markdown:
| icon           = poe2 patient_records_04 icon.png
| description    = One thing we haven't been lacking for is pottery.

Oderisi wasn't terribly excited about my little hobby, up until I explained that a single clay urn can fetch a very pretty sum when offered to the right collectors. Most of the artwork is too faded to make much sense of, and the rest is standard. Figures fighting one another, or being presented with victory wreaths. All very proper. I bet if I had one of the Huana craftsmen make a few unsavory additions we could double the price. - F
